description:
Gucci Guilty Intense Pour Femme EDP 90 ML - An Intoxicating Feminine Masterpiece

Discover the captivating allure of Gucci Guilty Intense Pour Femme, a seductive and sophisticated fragrance that embodies modern femininity with unparalleled intensity. This 90 ML eau de parfum is the perfect expression of boldness and sensuality for the woman who dares to be unforgettable. âœ¨

The Essence of Gucci Guilty Intense

Created as an amplified version of the original Gucci Guilty, this intense perfume delivers a more concentrated and powerful olfactory experience. The Gucci Guilty Intense Pour Femme is designed for the confident woman who embraces her desires and lives by her own rules. ðŸ”¥

Product Information
Size 90 ML
Gender Women
Product Type Eau de Parfum
Concentration Intense
Brand Gucci

Luxurious Fragrance Notes That Captivate

Fragrance Composition
Top Notes Pink Pepper, Mandarin, Bergamot
Heart Notes Lilac, Geranium, Violet, Peach
Base Notes Amber, Patchouli, Vanilla

Key Features of Gucci Guilty Intense Pour Femme

  • Enhanced longevity compared to the original version ðŸ’Ž
  • Stronger projection for a more impactful presence
  • Rich, oriental floral composition with amber undertones
  • Elegant bottle design with Gucci's signature interlocking G symbol
  • Perfect for evening wear and special occasions
  • Ideal for fall and winter seasons ðŸŒ¿

The Legacy of Gucci Fragrances

The House of Gucci, founded in 1921 by Guccio Gucci, has long been synonymous with Italian luxury and craftsmanship. The Gucci Guilty line, launched in 2010, revolutionized the fragrance industry with its bold character and distinctive bottle design. The Intense version elevates this iconic scent to new heights, offering a more indulgent experience for fragrance connoisseurs. ðŸŒ¸

This Gucci masterpiece has earned its place among the most sought-after amber-based fragrances in the luxury perfume market, continuing to captivate women who appreciate sophisticated, sensual scents with remarkable staying power.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Gucci Guilty Intense Pour Femme last on skin?

Gucci Guilty Intense Pour Femme offers exceptional longevity, typically lasting 8-10 hours on skin. The intense concentration ensures the fragrance develops beautifully throughout the day, with the rich amber and patchouli base notes lingering for hours. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points and layer with other Gucci Guilty products like body lotion or shower gel. ðŸ’«
